<Text: The Portuguese Podengo is an ancient multi-sensory hound (sight and scent) breed of dog from Portugal.>

Text: Portuguese Podengo:  Their coats are either short and 'smooth', or longer and 'wired'.

Text: Portuguese Podengo:  The smooth coated variety is traditional, dating back to the 5th century, whereas the wire coated variety is an outcome of the assimilation of various other breeds during the 20th century.
